'''Sprayfeather Gill Seed''' is a [[Gardening]] Material which can be obtained by harvesting [[Sprayfeather Gill]] with the [[Seed Dispensary]] or purchased from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|30|x=5}}.
